title: srI raajagOpAla suthanE
sahitya:
shrI rAjagOpAla sutanE! meru samAna (shrI rAja)

mARAda isaidAham tAnenRum taNiyAda  

anupallavi

pArOr pugazhndiDum bhAva sangItamE

vEROr vuvamAyk kANA subrahmanian nAmamE

caraNam

sukham tarum jayantasEnA dwaniyenavE

tigazhndiDum rAga sudhArNava priyanE!

nigarillA ezhil konjum vaNNa layapriyanE!

migai illai! uLam tanil udittadai uRaittEnE!
